cleaned_text: Chiropractic Located in the heart of Richmond, the leading health professionals at Better Bodies Wellness are dedicated to helping you achieve your wellness objectives -- combining skill and expertise that spans the entire chiropractic wellness spectrum. Drs. Foddrell are committed to bringing you better health and a better way of life by teaching and practicing the true principles of chiropractic wellness care. Patients seeking treatment at Better Bodies with Drs. Foddrell are assured of receiving only the finest quality care through the use of modern chiropractic equipment and technology. Drs. Foddrell and the staff have a genuine concern
